publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5932 Christine Grahame: BAFTA Nomination for Borders Actress Kelly Parish—That the Parliament congratulates Kelly Parish from Kelso in the Scottish Borders who has been nominated in the Acting Performance category of the BAFTA Scotland New Talent Awards 2010 for her leading role in the short film drama, Freeze; notes that the film highlights the role and invaluable work and dedication of young carers coping with an alcohol-dependent parent; welcomes the Scottish Government’s support for this film through the Creative Identities initiative, which was funded through the Scottish Government’s CashBack for Communities scheme in association with Borders Young Carers, and wishes Kelly every success in pursuing a career in acting.
S3M-5932 BAFTA Nomination for Borders Actress Kelly Parish (lodged on 10 March 2010) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-5932 Christine Grahame: BAFTA Nomination for Borders Actress Kelly Parish—That the Parliament congratulates Kelly Parish from Kelso in the Scottish Borders who has been nominated in the Acting Performance category of the BAFTA Scotland New Talent Awards 2010 for her leading role in the short film drama, Freeze; notes that the film highlights the role and invaluable work and dedication of young carers coping with an alcohol-dependent parent; welcomes the Scottish Government’s support for this film through the Creative Identities initiative, which was funded through the Scottish Government’s CashBack for Communities scheme in association with Borders Young Carers, and wishes Kelly every success in pursuing a career in acting. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
S3M-5932 BAFTA Nomination for Borders Actress Kelly Parish (lodged on 10 March 2010) Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Wilson*
